title: Tell me about a memorable sports game you watched.

korean: 2018년 월드컵 때 한국 대 독일 전이 정말 기억에 남아.
후반전에도 팽팽하게 가다가 추가 시간에 극적인 상황이 벌어졌어.
그리고 손흥민 선수가 추가 골까지 넣으면서 2대0 승리.
친구들이랑 같이 보다가 다 같이 환호했어.
비록 16강은 못 갔지만, 그 경기는 정말 짜릿했어.
english: The Korea vs. Germany match during the 2018 World Cup is really memorable.
Korea had already been eliminated from advancing to the round of 16.
But Germany was a championship candidate.
The first half ended 0-0 after the game started.
The second half was also tense, and then a dramatic situation happened in added time.
Player Kim Young-gwon scored a goal.
At that moment, I really got goosebumps.
And then player Son Heung-min scored an additional goal, making it a 2-0 victory.
I couldn't believe we beat Germany.
I was watching with friends, and we all cheered together.
Although we didn't make it to the round of 16, that game was really thrilling.
